message: RT @Meligy: RT @yochum: Microsoft Built A Human-Size Piano To Show Off A Brand-New Version Of Windows http://t.co/Y8Bg2oEEBL #technews
name: Microsoft Built A Human-Size Piano To Show Off A Brand-New Version Of Windows

description: Microsoft is working on a new version of Windows for the next big trend in computing, known as the Internet of Things.
